featuresSection.heading: Diverse Residential Rental Options Available to Rent House in Sector 86 Faridabad
description: Sector 86 is known for its architectural variety, catering to every budget and lifestyle requirement. Whether you need a compact, low-maintenance flat or a sprawling independent house with a private garden, the housing market here is robust and responsive. Understanding the specific types of rental homes available helps you narrow down your search efficiently and secure the best deal for long-term living.

We categorize the most popular rental offerings in Sector 86, ensuring you find precise matches based on size, furnishing status, and the type of community living you desire. Rent house in Sector 86 is simplified when you have clear insights into the local market dynamics and available inventory provided exclusively by verified owners and trusted property managers.

features.title: 1 BHK Studio Apartments
features.description: Ideal for students and single working professionals seeking compact, budget-friendly living spaces. These units often come semi-furnished and are situated close to commercial centres and public transport routes in Sector 86, offering maximum convenience with minimal upkeep. Discover efficient and modern studio apartments perfect for independent urban life.

features.title: 2 BHK Independent Floors
features.description: Perfect for small families or two sharing professionals. These independent floors offer more privacy than high-rise apartments and usually include dedicated parking space. Enjoy larger room sizes and a sense of community often missing in towering complexes when you choose to rent an independent floor in this thriving sector.

features.title: 3 BHK Builder Flats
features.description: These are the most sought-after rental options for mid-sized families looking for modern construction, spacious layouts, and access to essential amenities like power backup and security. Sector 86 boasts many newly constructed 3 BHK builder flats offering high-end finishes and modular kitchens ready for immediate occupation.

features.title: 4 BHK Luxury Kothis
features.description: For those requiring substantial space and luxury amenities, 4 BHK kothis or villas offer private gardens, servant quarters, and expansive living areas. These premium properties are usually found in gated communities within Sector 86, providing enhanced security and an exclusive lifestyle.

features.title: Semi-Furnished Rental Homes
features.description: The most common offering, semi-furnished homes typically include fixtures like fans, lights, modular kitchen cabinets, and wardrobes. This allows tenants the flexibility to furnish the house according to their personal taste while providing basic necessities needed for comfortable living immediately upon move-in.

features.title: Fully Furnished Executive Stays
features.description: Designed for corporate executives and expats, these homes are move-in ready with all furniture, electronics, and necessary utilities already installed. Choosing a fully furnished option when you rent house in Sector 86 eliminates the stress and cost associated with purchasing new household items.

Rent house in Sector 86 guarantees a perfect balance between peaceful residential life and proximity to urban convenience and infrastructure.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About How to Rent House in Sector 86 Faridabad
faqSection.description: We address your most pressing concerns regarding rental agreements, security deposits, lease terms, and the living standards in Sector 86 to ensure you make an informed decision and find the best property swiftly and efficiently.

faqs.question: What are the typical rental costs for a 2 BHK apartment in Sector 86 Faridabad
faqs.answer: The rental costs for a standard 2 BHK apartment in Sector 86 typically range between INR 12,000 to INR 18,000 per month, depending heavily on the furnishing level, age of the building, and the specific amenities provided by the society. Builder floors usually fall on the lower end, while flats in gated communities with advanced facilities like lifts and power backup command the higher price points. Always confirm whether maintenance charges are included in the quoted rent.

faqs.question: Is Sector 86 considered a safe residential area for families and working women
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 86 is generally regarded as one of the safer and more organized residential areas in Greater Faridabad. Many parts of the sector consist of well-maintained, planned colonies and secured housing societies with active Resident Welfare Associations. Street lighting is adequate, and the presence of mixed residential and commercial activity ensures continuous foot traffic, contributing to overall safety, particularly for families and single working women.

faqs.question: What is the standard lease duration and notice period required when renting in Sector 86
faqs.answer: The standard lease duration for residential properties in Sector 86 is typically 11 months, which is often renewed upon mutual agreement. A 12-month lease requiring mandatory registration is also common for formal agreements. The standard notice period for termination by either party is one or two months. It is crucial to have these terms clearly outlined in the registered rent agreement to avoid future disputes.

faqs.question: How much security deposit is generally required when I rent a house in this sector
faqs.answer: Landlords in Sector 86 usually request a security deposit equivalent to two months' rent. This deposit is refundable at the end of the tenancy period, provided the tenant has vacated the property without causing damage beyond normal wear and tear and has cleared all pending utility bills. Negotiating this deposit amount might be possible in some cases, especially for long-term corporate leases.

faqs.question: Are pet-friendly rental houses easily available in Sector 86 and what are the restrictions
faqs.answer: Finding pet-friendly rental houses in Sector 86 can sometimes be challenging, but it is not impossible. Individual homeowners and builder floors are more likely to permit pets than large apartment complexes which often have strict RWA rules against them. If you have a pet, it is essential to disclose this upfront. You may be required to pay a slightly higher security deposit to cover potential damages.

faqs.question: What is the water and electricity supply situation like in Sector 86 and how are charges calculated
faqs.answer: Sector 86 enjoys a reasonably stable supply of both water and electricity. Electricity charges are billed directly based on meter readings by the HVPNL Haryana Vidyut Prasaran Nigam Limited at state prescribed rates. Water supply usually relies on both municipal lines and borewell systems, and charges are often included in the monthly maintenance fee for society flats, or paid based on consumption meters for independent houses.

faqs.question: How far is Sector 86 from the nearest Metro Station and what public transport options are available
faqs.answer: The nearest operational Metro Station to Sector 86 is usually the Neelam Ajronda Metro Station or the Old Faridabad Metro Station on the Violet Line, both being approximately 6 to 8 kilometers away. Public transport is abundant, including shared auto-rickshaws, city buses, and readily available cab services, ensuring easy commutation to the Metro and other parts of Faridabad and Delhi-NCR.

faqs.question: What are the typical amenities provided with 3 BHK builder floors for rent in Sector 86
faqs.answer: 3 BHK builder floors in Sector 86 commonly include amenities such as reserved car parking, independent water and electricity connections, modular kitchens, and sometimes dedicated terrace or balcony space. Newer constructions might also offer lift access and some form of basic security surveillance. You should always inquire about the availability of power backup as this is a highly valued amenity.

faqs.question: Can I find independent villas or kothis for rent in Sector 86 or are most properties flats
faqs.answer: While Sector 86 has a large inventory of flats and builder floors, it also features a respectable number of independent villas and kothis for rent, particularly in the premium pockets and gated communities. These independent properties offer larger living spaces, private outdoor areas, and are ideal for those seeking enhanced privacy and luxury living options in Faridabad.

faqs.question: How do I initiate the viewing process and what documents are needed to finalize the rental agreement
faqs.answer: To initiate a viewing, simply contact us through the enquiry form or call our support line, referencing the specific property ID. To finalize the agreement, essential documents required typically include identity proof Aadhaar Card or Passport, address proof, recent photographs, and in some cases, employment verification letter. Both parties must provide necessary documents for lease registration.
